name: Snail Riot
description:
The ants have taken over the garden. You're just a little snail, but you will start a riot! Fight the ants, explore the garden and find the evil Ant Queen.

Controls:
W or ↑  Walk up
S  or  ↓  Walk down
A  or ←  Walk left
D or →  Walk right
ENTER   Interaction / continue / confirm
ESC     Pause Menu
